title: Lusum Set of 50 Sports Safety Space Marker Cones with Stand and Bag - Sports Training Football Cones Set - Indoor/Outdoor Use
features: Enhance Your Training: Professional quality sports training cones, perfect for all land-based sports including football, rugby, and cricket. Ideal for both indoor and outdoor environments, they serve as boundary markers and are excellent for drills, warm-ups, and slalom exercises

Complete Training Set: This football cones training set for kids includes a full set of 50 heavy-duty sports marker cones with a carry stand. Additionally, you'll receive a breathable mesh bag with a drawstring closure, allowing air circulation when not in use

High Visibility Colours: Each Lusum sports football marker cones feature five high-visibility colours—Pink, Red, Blue, Yellow, and White. These bright colours ensure the cones stand out during drills, even in poor lighting, making them a must-have for any

Durable And Safe Design: Lusum sports markers are waterproof and robust, made from Polypropylene for durability. These full-sized multisport training marker cones measure 180mm in diameter and rise 50mm, returning to shape without causing injuries, making them ideal football training cones

Quality Without Compromise: Lusum doesn't sponsor teams or players, unlike other brands, allowing us to invest in better technology and materials. Enjoy superior at a lower cost, ensuring you get the most reliable cones for football training without breaking the bank
description: Product Description And we have the perfect training equipment for you. Our space marker cones, rubber training markers and safety marker cones are an excellent choice for a variety of drills across a range of sports including football, netball, rugby, hockey, tennis & more. Optimal visibility All our training equipment is manufactured in bright colours so they can be seen clearly even in poor lighting conditions. You can train when it’s raining, cloudy, chilly, or under sunny weather. Portable & Lightweight Our speed and agility exercise materials are lightweight, safe and easy to bring along. Allowing you to work out from the location of your choice. Indoor & Outdoor use Our sports training equipment can be used indoors or outdoors and is manufactured with fade-resistant materials meaning your training materials stay fresh looking for longer. Multi-Sport Cones with Stand Pro Quality Sports Training Cones, suitable for use in all land-based sports such as football, rugby, cricket and many more. They are also suitable for indoor and outdoor use. Can be used as boundary markers or to mark out training areas, warm-up drills, shuttle and slalom-based exercises. The multisport cones measure 180mm diameter and have a rise of 50mm . They are heavy duty cones but are fully flexible, when landed on, they instantly return to shape and will not cause injury to younger players. 9" Training Safety Marker Cones Each Premium Quality Lusum collapsible cone measures 9 inches (225mm) with a wide base of 140mm x 140mm (5 1/2" x 5 1/2") for improved stability and the collapsible design gives extra safety as they WILL NOT cause injury if fallen on. Perfect for use with young children but hardy enough to use with adults too. Each cone also has a hole in each corner should you wish to anchor down onto soft surfaces. The Training Traffic Style Cones are ideal for a variety of sporting activities. Full Sized Flat Rubber Sports Markers Lusum's high-quality flexible non-slip rubber sports markers are available as 10-pack or 20-pack with this pack plus heavy-duty zipped bag. Measuring 200mm (20cm) diameter discs which make them the perfect size to use as player markers or for targets (8 Inches). Suitable for use indoors and outdoors on any flat surface. Hard-wearing rubber compound materials ensure they can used time after time. Non-Slip Rectangular Rubber Markers Lusum Rectangular Rubber Markers are the best quality non sli p, flexible sports markers and are ideal for marking out a playing area on all types of surfaces. They are so durable they can be used indoors and outdoors Size: each marker is 35cm x 8cm Thickness: 3mm , ensuring the marker can be used safely without becoming a tripping hazard. Weight: around 130g each Sports Ball Shop is a sports ball specialist, offering customers a huge range of branded balls across an unrivalled number of sporting platforms. We have the expertise to provide almost anything you might need, including a full range of training equipment as well as sports balls.
